001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.viewmodel;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.util.Log;
005import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
006import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
007import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
008import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
009import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
010import androidx.lifecycle.Transformations;
011import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
012import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
013import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.entity.User;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.service.UserRepository;
016import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
017import java.util.List;
018import javax.inject.Inject;
019
020/**
021 * Provides access (for a UI controller or data-bound view) to the {@link User} entity instance
022 * corresponding to the current signed-in user, a user specified by its unique identifier (primary
023 * key value), and the full collection of users who have signed in to the app. This access includes
024 * persistence operations on individual {@link User} entity instances.
025 */
026@HiltViewModel
027public class UserViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
028
029  private final UserRepository repository;
030  private final MutableLiveData<Long> currentUserId;
031  private final LiveData<User> currentUser;
032  private final MutableLiveData<Long> userId;
033  private final LiveData<User> user;
034  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
035  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
036
037  @Inject
038  UserViewModel(@ApplicationContext Context context, UserRepository repository) {
039    this.repository = repository;
040    currentUserId = new MutableLiveData<>();
041    currentUser = Transformations.switchMap(currentUserId, repository::get);
042    userId = new MutableLiveData<>();
043    user = Transformations.switchMap(userId, repository::get);
044    throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
045    pending = new CompositeDisposable();
046    fetchCurrentUser();
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Returns {@link LiveData} containing the {@link User} entity instance for the current signed-in
051   * user.
052   */
053  public LiveData<User> getCurrentUser() {
054    return currentUser;
055  }
056
057  public void setUserId(long userId) {
058    this.userId.setValue(userId);
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Returns {@link LiveData} containing the {@link User} entity instance specified in the most
063   * recent invocation of {@link #setUserId(long)}. If there are any
064   * {@link androidx.lifecycle.Observer observers} of the result returned by this method, the
065   * retrieval will be performed automatically on invocation of {@link #setUserId(long)}, and the
066   * observers will be invoked (asynchronously) with the result.
067   */
068  public LiveData<User> getUser() {
069    return user;
070  }
071
072
073  public LiveData<List<User>> getUsers() {
074    return repository.getAll();
075  }
076
077  public void save(User user) {
078    repository
079        .save(user)
080        .subscribe(
081            (u) -> {
082            },
083            this::postThrowable,
084            pending
085        );
086  }
087
088  public void delete(User user) {
089    repository
090        .delete(user)
091        .subscribe(
092            () -> {
093            },
094            this::postThrowable,
095            pending
096        );
097  }
098
099  @Override
100  public void onStop(@NonNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
101    DefaultLifecycleObserver.super.onStop(owner);
102  }
103
104  private void fetchCurrentUser() {
105    repository
106        .getCurrent()
107        .subscribe(
108            (user) -> currentUserId.postValue(user.getId()),
109            this::postThrowable,
110            pending
111        );
112  }
113
114  private void postThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
115    Log.e(getClass().getSimpleName(), throwable.getMessage(), throwable);
116    this.throwable.postValue(throwable);
117  }
118
119}
